alert.note: Alert for Trimble (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 2:00PM EST until February 27 at 2:30PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Trimble County in central Kentucky... * Until 230 PM EST. * At 200 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bedford, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Trimble County, including the following locations... Trout and Monitor. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
